about_the_game:
Head out to Moonlight Mountain at midnight with your glowing snowboard and snowmobile, but be careful out there... Sometimes when you hit the slopes at night, the slopes hit back. GlowBoard: WinterFest is a celebration of couch gaming and nostalgic snowy sillyness, including split-screen and online snowboard battles, snowmobile races and a unique puzzle arcade snow fort destruction mode. Race against other local riders or challenge AI, try and find some power-ups along the trail to make things a little more interesting. Welcome to GlowBoard, let's ride!

Featuring Three Unique Game Modes:

GlowBoard

  • Local 4-player split-screen snowboard action *
  • Take the action online with matchmaking
  • Race or battle it out for points on the slopes
  • Several vastly nasty different trails to ride

GlowMobile

  • Snowmobile combat racing!
  • Race online or against AI
  • Split-screen snowmobile madness!
  • King of the Hill survival mode

NightFort

  • Unique game mode with familiar billiards-inspired rules
  • Place, angle and size snow ramps then jump off those ramps
  • Use your body to try and destroy a series of fort puzzles
  • Play your friend locally or solo puzzle challenge mode


Including...

Battle Races

  • Pickup powerups galore! Use them to conquer the slopes. (Optionally)
  • Bombs, bananas, lightning, and more! Including the dreaded yellow snowballs
  • Solo adventures or AI to race against (GlowBoard or GlowMobile)

Lodge

  • Warm & cozy, immersive & interactive lodge menu as home base
  • Head back to the lodge to check out your new unlocks and customize your ride
  • Choose from a hundred unlockable riders each with a variety of skin and outfit colors, dozens of hats, tons of snowboard designs and snowmobile colors



Plus everything is glowing and the game takes place at night, did I forget to mention that? The mountain is more fun at night!

*Multiplayer local split-screen requires multiple controllers, this game was designed with controllers in mind so plug one in for the best experience

Developed with love by an independent solo developer in Florida who misses the snow.
detailed_description:
Head out to Moonlight Mountain at midnight with your glowing snowboard and snowmobile, but be careful out there... Sometimes when you hit the slopes at night, the slopes hit back. GlowBoard: WinterFest is a celebration of couch gaming and nostalgic snowy sillyness, including split-screen and online snowboard battles, snowmobile races and a unique puzzle arcade snow fort destruction mode. Race against other local riders or challenge AI, try and find some power-ups along the trail to make things a little more interesting. Welcome to GlowBoard, let's ride!

Featuring Three Unique Game Modes:

GlowBoard

  • Local 4-player split-screen snowboard action *
  • Take the action online with matchmaking
  • Race or battle it out for points on the slopes
  • Several vastly nasty different trails to ride

GlowMobile

  • Snowmobile combat racing!
  • Race online or against AI
  • Split-screen snowmobile madness!
  • King of the Hill survival mode

NightFort

  • Unique game mode with familiar billiards-inspired rules
  • Place, angle and size snow ramps then jump off those ramps
  • Use your body to try and destroy a series of fort puzzles

Including...

  • Pickup powerups galore! Use them to conquer the slopes. (Optionally)
  • Bombs, bananas, lightning, and more! Including the dreaded yellow snowballs
  • Solo adventures or AI to race against (GlowBoard or GlowMobile)

  • Warm & cozy, immersive & interactive lodge menu as home base
  • Head back to the lodge to check out your new unlocks and customize your ride
  • Choose from a hundred unlockable riders each with a variety of skin and outfit colors, dozens of hats, tons of snowboard designs and snowmobile colors



Plus everything is glowing and the game takes place at night, did I forget to mention that? The mountain is more fun at night!

*Multiplayer local split-screen requires multiple controllers, this game was designed with controllers in mind so plug one in for the best experience

Developed with love by an independent solo developer in Florida who misses the snow.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2380 or equivalent / AMD FX-6100 (6 * 3300) or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, 3 GB (Legacy: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 780, 4GB) or AMD RX 580, 4 GB (Legacy: AMD R9 290X, 4GB )
  • Storage: 16 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04/Steam OS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2380 or equivalent / AMD FX-6100 (6 * 3300) or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, 3 GB (Legacy: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 780, 4GB) or AMD RX 580, 4 GB (Legacy: AMD R9 290X, 4GB )

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina (10.15.6)
  • Processor: 3.1 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 650 1536 MB
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

name: GlowBoard: WinterFest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2380 or equivalent / AMD FX-6100 (6 * 3300) or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 Ti (1024 MB) / Radeon HD 7770 (1024 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: GlowBoard: WinterFest is an homage to retro couch gaming, with a glowing twist! Ride your way down Moonlight Mountain at night, with split-screen, online snowboarding & snowmobile races, trick competitions, snow fort destruction, wacky powerups & a hundred customizable riders.
